# VideoReader.CameraAsyncBuffers

**Structure**

An async sequence of video frames.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CameraAsyncBuffers
```

## Overview

This sequence allows iterating through the camera frames. Only one iterator can be created per sequence.

## Getting the capture session

- **captureSession**: The capture session.

## Getting the buffer count

- **count**: The number of frames. For this sequence count is always nil.

## Creating an iterator

- **makeAsyncIterator()**: Constructs an iterator.
- **VideoReader.CameraAsyncBuffers.Iterator**: An async iterator of video frames.

## Reading

- **read(_:)**: Reads a sequence of annotated files as an array of annotated async sequences of video frames.
- **readCamera(configuration:)**: Reads an async sequence of video frames captured with a video camera.
- **read(contentsOf:)**: Reads a video file as an async sequence of video frames.
- **VideoReader.AsyncFrames**: An async sequence of video frames.
- **VideoReader.CameraConfiguration**: The configuration of the camera to pass to the `readCamera` method.

## Conforms To

- AsyncSequence
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- TemporalSequence
